notes: This is a modern, newly built high-rise apartment in excellent condition with clean white walls, polished tile floors, modern LED lighting, and contemporary furniture. The balcony has tall vertical railings which provide good safety for children, though a baby gate at the balcony door would be advisable. The unit has excellent natural light with large floor-to-ceiling windows, a spacious open layout with no visible sharp corners or hazards, and appears to be in a luxury building with quality finishes.
